con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="urn:MOB:UserCentral" xmlns:s0="urn:MOB:UserCentral" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:MOB:UserCentral"> <xsd:element name="RefreshCounters" type="s0:InputMapping1"/> <xsd:complexType name="InputMapping1"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="z1D_serviceName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="RefreshCountersResponse" type="s0:OutputMapping1"/> <xsd:complexType name="OutputMapping1"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="countIncidents" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="countChanges" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="countTasks" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="countSignatures" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="Connect" type="s0:InputMapping3"/> <xsd:complexType name="InputMapping3"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="z1D_serviceName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="ConnectResponse" type="s0:OutputMapping3"/> <xsd:complexType name="OutputMapping3"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Request_ID" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="countIncidents" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="countChanges" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="countTasks" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="countSignatures" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="fullName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="emailAddress" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="licenseType" nillable="true" type="s0:licenseTypeType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="groupList" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="licenseTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Read"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Fixed"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Floating"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Restricted Read"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="AuthenticationInfo" type="s0:AuthenticationInfo"/> <xsd:complexType name="AuthenticationInfo"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="userName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="password" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="authentication" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="locale" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="timeZone" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="RefreshCountersSoapOut"> <wsdl:part element="s0:RefreshCountersResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RefreshCountersSoapIn"> <wsdl:part element="s0:RefreshCounters" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ConnectSoapOut"> <wsdl:part element="s0:ConnectResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ConnectSoapIn"> <wsdl:part element="s0:Connect" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ARAuthenticate"> <wsdl:part element="s0:AuthenticationInfo" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="MOB_UserCentral_PortPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="RefreshCounters"> <wsdl:input message="s0:RefreshCountersSoapIn"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="s0:RefreshCountersSoapOut"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="Connect"> <wsdl:input message="s0:ConnectSoapIn"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="s0:ConnectSoapOut"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="MOB_UserCentral_PortSoapBinding" type="s0:MOB_UserCentral_PortPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="RefreshCounters"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:MOB:UserCentral/RefreshCounters" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="s0:ARAuthenticate" part="parameters" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="Connect"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:MOB:UserCentral/Connect" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="s0:ARAuthenticate" part="parameters" use="literal"></soap:header> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="MOB:UserCentralService"> <wsdl:port binding="s0:MOB_UserCentral_PortSoapBinding" name="MOB_UserCentral_PortSoap"> <soap:address location="http://ittux8:8080/arsys/services/ARService?server=ittux8&webService=MOB:UserCentral"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
